CREATE TABLE clients (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(255),
    client_email VARCHAR(255),
    client_phone VARCHAR(20),
    attorney_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (attorney_id) REFERENCES attorneys(attorney_id)
);

DELETE FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE clients (client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
client_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE attorneys (attorney_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
attorney_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
bar_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
practice_area VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE cases (case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
case_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
client_id INT,
attorney_id INT,
status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE interactions (interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
interaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
client_id INT,
attorney_id INT,
notes VARCHAR(1000)
)

CREATE TABLE contacts (contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
contact_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
email VARCHAR(255),
client_id INT,
attorney_id INT
)
